sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container grid-list-md text-xs-center>
    <v-layout row wrap>
      <v-flex xs12 offset-sm2 sm8 offset-md3 md6 offset-lg4 lg4>
        <v-card hover color="#eee" style="margin-top:150px;padding:30px 15px;">
          <v-tabs fixed-tabs v-model="activeTab" color="#eee" slider-color="primary">
            <v-tab key="login">
              login
            </v-tab>
            <v-tab key="register">
              register
            </v-tab>
            <v-tab-item key="login">
              <v-form
                ref="l_form"
                v-model="l_valid"
                lazy-validation
              >
                <v-text-field
                  v-model="l_email"
                  :rules="l_emailRules"
                  label="E-mail"
                  required
                ></v-text-field>

                <v-text-field
                  v-model="l_telephone"
                  :counter="10"
                  :rules="l_telephoneRules"
                  label="Telephone"
                  required
                ></v-text-field>

                <v-checkbox
                  v-model="l_checkbox"
                  :rules="[v => !!v || 'You must agree to continue!']"
                  label="Do you agree?"
                  required
                ></v-checkbox>

                <v-btn
                  :disabled="!l_valid"
                  color="success"
                  @click="validate"
                >
                  Validate
                </v-btn>

                <v-btn
                  color="error"
                  @click="reset"
                >
                  Reset Form
                </v-btn>

                <v-btn
                  color="warning"
                  @click="resetValidation"
                >
                  Reset Validation
                </v-btn>
              </v-form>
            </v-tab-item>
            <v-tab-item key="register">
              <v-form
                ref="r_form"
                v-model="r_valid"
                lazy-validation
              >
                <v-text-field
                  v-model="r_email"
                  :rules="r_emailRules"
                  label="E-mail"
                  required
                ></v-text-field>

                <v-text-field
                  v-model="r_telephone"
                  :counter="10"
                  :rules="r_telephoneRules"
                  label="Telephone"
                  required
                ></v-text-field>

                <v-checkbox
                  v-model="r_checkbox"
                  :rules="[v => !!v || 'You must agree to continue!']"
                  label="Do you agree?"
                  required
                ></v-checkbox>

                <v-btn
                  :disabled="!r_valid"
                  color="success"
                  @click="validate"
                >
                  Validate
                </v-btn>

                <v-btn
                  color="error"
                  @click="reset"
                >
                  Reset Form
                </v-btn>

                <v-btn
                  color="warning"
                  @click="resetValidation"
                >
                  Reset Validation
                </v-btn>
              </v-form>
            </v-tab-item>
          </v-tabs>
          
          
        </v-card>
      </v-flex>
    </v-layout>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data: () => ({
      activeTab:'login',
      l_valid: true,
      l_telephone: '',
      l_telephoneRules: [
        v => !!v || 'Telephone is required',
        v => (v && v.length <= 10) || 'Telephone must be less than 10 characters'
      ],
      l_email: '',
      l_emailRules: [
        v => !!v || 'E-mail is required',
        v => /.+@.+/.test(v) || 'E-mail must be valid'
      ],
      l_checkbox: false,
      r_valid: true,
      r_telephone: '',
      r_telephoneRules: [
        v => !!v || 'Telephone is required',
        v => (v && v.length <= 10) || 'Telephone must be less than 10 characters'
      ],
      r_email: '',
      r_emailRules: [
        v => !!v || 'E-mail is required',
        v => /.+@.+/.test(v) || 'E-mail must be valid'
      ],
      r_checkbox: false
    }),

    methods: {
      validate () {
        if (this.$refs['r_form'].validate()) {
          this.snackbar = true
        }
      },
      reset () {
        this.$refs['r_form'].reset()
      },
      resetValidation () {
        this.$refs['r_form'].resetValidation()
      }
    }
  }
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
  
</style>
